snippet: For the third time in four years, the Ibrahim Foundation found no former African head of state worthy of its good-governance award.
abstract: Ibrahim Prize for Achievement in African Leadership, multimillion-dollar good governance prize for African leaders, fails to find winner for third time in four years; failure is testimony to continuing difficulties bedeviling democracy and human rights on the continent.
lead_paragraph: For the third time in four years, the Ibrahim Foundation found no former African head of state worthy of its good-governance award.

headline.seo: No Ibrahim Prize for African Leadership This Year
headline.main: No Ibrahim Prize for African Leadership This Year
headline.print_headline: Prize for African Leadership Again Goes Unawarded

keywords.value: Ibrahim, Mo, Prize for Achievement in African Leadership
